languages.text: "Но таков мой долг перед Вольным Торговцем — неусыпно нести вахту подле Лорд-капитана, служить опорой в самые темные времена — для вас и для меня". {n}Абеляр выпрямляется и смотрит вам в глаза с мрачной убежденностью.{/n} "Я {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}не отступлюсь от своей роли{/d}, чтобы не происходило. Не сомневайтесь во мне. Семья Версериан сделает выводы из произошедшего и, если наша кровь чего-то стоит, будет готова к новым испытаниям без моей опеки".

"But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}will not step down from my role{/d}, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."
languages.original_text: "Но таков мой долг перед Вольным Торговцем — неусыпно нести вахту подле Лорд-капитана, служить опорой в самые темные времена — для вас и для меня". {n}Абеляр выпрямляется и смотрит вам в глаза с мрачной убежденностью.{/n} "Я {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}не отступлюсь от своей роли{/d}, чтобы не происходило. Не сомневайтесь во мне. Семья Версериан сделает выводы из произошедшего и, если наша кровь чего-то стоит, будет готова к новым испытаниям без моей опеки".

traits.locale_text: "But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I will not step down from my role, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}will not step down from my role{/d}, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Doch dies ist meine Pflicht {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} gegenüber – unermüdlich an der Seite des Lord Captains Wache zu halten, als Stütze in dunkelsten Zeiten zu dienen. Für Euch und für mich." {n}Abelard richtet sich auf und blickt dir mit grimmiger Überzeugung direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ich {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}werde mein Amt nicht niederlegen{/d}, was auch geschieht. Zweifelt nicht an mir. Die Familie Werserian wird aus dem Geschehenen lernen. Und wenn unser Blut etwas wert ist, dann wird sie neuen Prüfungen auch ohne meine führende Hand trotzen können."
languages.original_text: "But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}will not step down from my role{/d}, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."

traits.locale_text: "Doch dies ist meine Pflicht {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} gegenüber — unermüdlich an der Seite des Lord Captains Wache zu halten, als Stütze in dunkelsten Zeiten zu dienen. Für Euch und für mich." {n}Abelard richtet sich auf und blickt dir mit grimmiger Überzeugung direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ich werde mein Amt nicht niederlegen, was auch geschieht. Zweifelt nicht an mir. Die Familie Werserian wird aus dem Geschehenen lernen. Und wenn unser Blut etwas wert ist, dann wird sie neuen Prüfungen auch ohne meine führende Hand trotzen können."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Mais tel est mon devoir envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} : monter inlassablement la garde à vos côtés et servir de soutien dans la pire des adversités, tant pour vous que pour moi-même. » {n}Abélard se redresse et vous lance un regard lourd d'une sinistre détermination.{/n} « Quoi qu'il advienne, je {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}n'abandonnerai pas mon poste{/d}. Ne doutez pas de moi. La famille Werserian tirera des leçons de tout ceci, et si notre lignée a la moindre valeur, elle sera prête à affronter les épreuves qui l'attendent sans mon aide. »
languages.original_text: "But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}will not step down from my role{/d}, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."

traits.locale_text: « Mais tel est mon devoir envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} : monter inlassablement la garde à vos côtés et servir de soutien dans la pire des adversités, tant pour vous que pour moi-même. » {n}Abélard se redresse et vous lance un regard lourd d'une sinistre détermination.{/n} « Quoi qu'il advienne, je n'abandonnerai pas mon poste. Ne doutez pas de moi. La famille Werserian tirera des leçons de tout ceci, et si notre lignée a la moindre valeur, elle sera prête à affronter les épreuves qui l'attendent sans mon aide. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “但这正是我应对行商浪人履行的职责，在舰长大人身边不知疲倦地守望，在最黑暗的时刻充当后盾。这既是为了您，也是为了我自己。”{n}阿贝拉德挺直腰板直视着你，目光中带着严酷的决心。{/n}“无论发生什么事情，我都{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}不会离开岗位{/d}，这一点您无需怀疑。韦尔森家族会从发生的事情中吸取教训。我们也一定会做好准备，在没有我引导的情况下，迎接新的考验。”
languages.original_text: "But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}will not step down from my role{/d}, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."

traits.locale_text: “但这正是我应对行商浪人履行的职责，在舰长大人身边不知疲倦地守望，在最黑暗的时刻充当后盾。这既是为了您，也是为了我自己。”{n}阿贝拉德挺直腰板直视着你，目光中带着严酷的决心。{/n}“无论发生什么事情，我都不会离开岗位，这一点您无需怀疑。韦尔森家族会从发生的事情中吸取教训。我们也一定会做好准备，在没有我引导的情况下，迎接新的考验。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「しかし、それが私の自由開拓者への義務です。ロード・キャプテンのもと、たゆまぬ監視を続け、最も絶望的な局面において支えとなること。あなたと私のためにです」{n}アベラルドが身を引き締め、厳粛な確信をもって見つめる。{/n}「何が起ころうと、{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}私はこの役割から下りません{/d}。私を疑わないでください。ウェルザリアン家はこの出来事から学び、私の導きなしにも新たな試練に立ち向かう準備ができるはずです。我々の血筋に価値があるならば」
languages.original_text: "But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}will not step down from my role{/d}, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、それが私の自由開拓者への義務です。ロード・キャプテンのもと、たゆまぬ監視を続け、最も絶望的な局面において支えとなること。あなたと私のためにです」{n}アベラルドが身を引き締め、厳粛な確信をもって見つめる。{/n}「何が起ころうと、{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}私はこの役割から下りません{/d}。私を疑わないでください。ウェルザリアン家はこの出来事から学び、私の導きなしにも新たな試練に立ち向かう準備ができるはずです。我々の血筋に価値があるならば」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Pero ese es mi deber hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente: mantenerme vigilante junto a mi Lord Capitán, apoyarl{mf|e|a} en los momentos más oscuros... tanto para usted como para mí». {n}Abelard se yergue y te mira a los ojos con una convicción sombría.{/n} «{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}No abandonaré mi puesto{/d}, pase lo que pase. No dude de mí. La familia Werserian descubrirá lo ocurrido y, si nuestra sangre sigue teniendo el menor valor, estará lista para enfrentarse a nuevos desafíos sin mi guía».
languages.original_text: "But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}will not step down from my role{/d}, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ese es mi deber hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente: mantenerme vigilante junto a mi Lord Capitán, apoyarl{mf|e|a} en los momentos más oscuros... tanto para usted como para mí». {n}Abelard se yergue y te mira a los ojos con una convicción sombría.{/n} «No abandonaré mi puesto, pase lo que pase. No dude de mí. La familia Werserian descubrirá lo ocurrido y, si nuestra sangre sigue teniendo el menor valor, estará lista para enfrentarse a nuevos desafíos sin mi guía».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I will not step down from my role, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."

languages.text: "Fakat Hür Tacir'e hizmet etmek, benim vazifemdir. Lord Kaptan'ı yorulmaksızın müdafaa etmek, en kötü günlerimizde destek olmaktır görevim. Kaldı ki her ikimiz için de bu görevi ifa etmekteyim." {n}Abelard, dikilip acı bir kararlılıkla gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Ne olursa olsun {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}bu vazifeyi terk etmeyeceğim{/d}. Werserian ailesi, bu olanlardan ders çıkaracaktır. Kanımız beş para ediyorsa benim rehberliğim olmadan da başka zorluklara göğüs gerecektir."
languages.original_text: "But such is my duty to the Rogue Trader — to keep tireless watch at the Lord Captain's side, to serve as a support in the darkest of times — for you and for me." {n}Abelard straightens and looks you in the eye with grim conviction.{/n} "I {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}will not step down from my role{/d}, no matter what happens. Do not doubt me. The Werserian family will learn from what has happened and, if our blood is worth anything, will be ready to face new trials without my guiding hand."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat Hür Tacir'e hizmet etmek benim vazifemdir. Lord Kaptan'ı yorulmaksızın müdafaa etmek, en kötü günlerimizde destek olmaktır görevim. Ve bu görevi her ikimiz için ifa etmekteyim." {n}Abelard dikilip acı bir kararlılıkla gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Ne olursa olsun bu vazifeyi terk etmeyeceğim. Werserian hanesi bu olanlardan ders çıkaracaktır. Kanımız beş para ediyorsa benim rehberliğim olmadan da başka zorluklara göğüs gerecektir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
